storyblokEntry.content: {"_uid":"dc1ec3a8-61f8-4399-8874-4d4c06e979b6","body":[{"id":"hero","_uid":"1a753aff-6cbc-4225-ab4b-a74d0a8a4d1b","main":[{"_uid":"42e41368-6d94-41f7-9fd6-0207f1aa94a2","title":"BRS","component":"work_hero"}],"theme":"dark","padding":"8","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"","full_height":false,"isFullWidth":true},{"id":"overview","_uid":"c99b9557-e564-4f81-8dee-82aaf4cacaa8","main":[{"id":"overview","_uid":"6fb12dec-cea7-4526-bde8-a0a1422889ea","main":[{"_uid":"bc0257a4-3886-4173-964e-f2a8d7df972a","text":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"BlueRunner Solutions is a digital solutions company specialising in the food services industry. I started in May 16 working under my design manager then took over as sole designer in Oct 17 for almost year before leaving in Sep 18.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"My role was varied as BRS created apps, websites and CMS systems for clients as well as marketing and promotional support.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"While at BRS I designed a wide variety of apps including food ordering, loyalty and more. Designing CMS systems and food ordering sites ans systems. As well as designing and developing websites for a varied target audience.","type":"text"}]}]},"alignment":"left","component":"header","isScrolling":false,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":""},{"cta":"Check them out","_uid":"88ce9304-ed70-443f-9884-5ea350fa44c4","link":{"id":"","url":"https://www.bluerunnersolutions.com/","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"https://www.bluerunnersolutions.com/"},"variant":"contained","component":"button"}],"theme":"light","padding":"20","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"content","isFullWidth":false},{"id":"loyalty","_uid":"e91cc956-c762-4423-98fe-3838f1222c22","main":[{"_uid":"bf0be9bd-2c44-42c7-904b-d4eeaf049d27","text":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"alignment":"","component":"header","isScrolling":true,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":"Pre-Order & Loyalty App. "}],"theme":"light","padding":"","spacing":"20","component":"section","isAnimated":false,"px_padding":"","full_height":true},{"id":"","_uid":"bf3aa983-54be-42db-87af-3868113ea1b5","main":[{"_uid":"b178f0fa-7f2b-4033-bd45-cd47e3572769","text":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"One of BlueRunner Solutions' (BRS) apps was a white labeled","type":"text"},{"text":" Loyalty and ordering app","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" for catering companies, cafés etc. One of my tasks was to create an app that had solid UX and was also customisable and rebrandable when selling to clients.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I was able to take the screens to user testing as one of our key clients was a University campus café. After receiving feedback on the previous app I created these redesigns, with clear concise colour placement as these would be key to rebranding the app.","type":"text"}]}]},"alignment":"left","component":"header","isScrolling":false,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":""},{"_uid":"0fc7c263-f6c4-459d-83d3-9320745df10f","columns":[{"_uid":"f6e82409-d994-4653-8ac9-5b75ef68b1ec","image":{"id":10298217,"alt":"BRS app - Like the app this system also had to be white labeled. One of the last projects I worked on before I left was a redesign of the old fashioned system.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I created a new clean sharp design, basing the UX/UI on retail websites rather than old fashioned booking tools as I wanted to bring the product into 2018 (which was up to date at the time!).
